---
title: "dict_gen"
output: html_document
date: '2022-12-14'
---

```{r}
library(arabic2kansuji)
dict = readLines("test.txt")
ans = dict
for (x in 2:40) {
  text = gsub("1",as.character(x),dict)
  text = gsub("ä¸€",arabic2kansuji_num(x),text)
  ans = append(ans, text)
}
sink("synonyms.txt")
writeLines(unlist(lapply(ans, paste, collapse=" ")))
sink()

```
